sentence.Network_en: Even in his dotage, the Professor still sits on the committee.
sentence.Network_cn: 即便上了年纪，教授仍然是委员会的一员。

sentence.Network_en: Sarah moved back in with her father so that she could look after him in his dotage.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨拉搬回来与父亲同住,好在他年老时照顾他.

sentence.Network_en: Merlin fell in a dotage on the damsel.
sentence.Network_cn: 墨林深深地爱上那少女.

RelatedPhrase.word: He has dotage because of old age

list.key: He has dotage because of old age
list.abs: 我还没到老糊涂的年纪呢,我可以自己开车到吉利去。 3. He is in his dotage .他老朽了。 4. He has dotage because of old age他因年老而糊里糊涂。.
He is in his dotage ., 他老朽了.

entry.def: If someone is in their dotage, they are very old and becoming weak.

example.ex: Even in his dotage, the Professor still sits on the committee.
example.tran: 即便上了年纪，教授仍然是委员会的一员。

example.ex: ...spending his dotage in a riverside cottage.
example.tran: 在河畔小屋中度过他的晚年

means.word_mean: 1. mental infirmity as a consequence of old age; sometimes shown by foolish infatuations

auth_sentence.content: The wanderings of his dotage, and flim-flam after all.
auth_sentence.res_content: The wanderings of his dotage, and flim-flam after all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The wanderings of his dotage, and flim-flam after all.

auth_sentence.content: Wait until I'm a hundred...Don't hurry me into my dotage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wait until I'm a hundred...Don't hurry me into my dotage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wait until I'm a hundred...Don't hurry me into my dotage.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

sentences.en: Sarah moved back in with her father so that she could look after him in his dotage.
sentences.cn: 萨拉搬回来与父亲同住，好在他年老时照顾他。

sentences.en: Sometimes the kids talk to me as if I’m in my dotage!
sentences.cn: 有时候孩子们跟我说话的样子就像我是个老糊涂似的！
